entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -25.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
